text: Urban structure It is the order of organization of planning areas and of land use within the cities and sometimes even smaller towns. == List of Neighbourhood's Types == * Open Neighbourhood * Close Neighbourhood == List of Business District == * Central business district * Secondary Business Center == List of Industrial Zones == * Technology Park * Industrial District == List of Public Urban Spaces == * Urban open space * Privately owned public space == List of Street Types == * Avenue * Boulevard * Alley * Square * Town square == List of Basic Urban Models == * Grid plan * Sector model * Concentric zone model * Multiple nuclei model * Linear city model == Other websites == * Urban land use patterns and models, geographycasestudy site Category:Urban and regional sciences
title: Urban structure
